website_summaries.verdict: 3-product kit includes a cleanser, toner, and hydrating/spot treatment lotion. Active ingredient is salicylic acid 2% strength.
pros: Most people were very pleased with the results of this treatment regime, which comes in 3 strengths to address minor, moderate, and severe acne
The price is extremely reasonable, particularly considering each kit lasts 60 days
cons: Some people weren't happy with their skin's response (but possibly due to not carefully following directions for use)

customer_reviews.title: Burnt skin, not beautiful skin.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to use this for my daughters with mild acne. It has burnt their skin horribly. I don't believe this product is safe.
customer_reviews.author: God_First

customer_reviews.title: Gross!
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak to how the product works but I don't know that I'll purchase it again based on how terrible the packaging was. The box was dented and it caused the tube inside to be deformed and there was an old piece of chewed gum stuck on the top of the inner package. Disgusting and unacceptable!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy from this vendor !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product all the time with no issues. So, this time i noticed the face wash was runny.. Being a busy working woman I really didn't pay it any mind until i broke out in a rash all over my face. This product has an expiration date of 6/2018. Do not buy from here I am highly upset.
customer_reviews.author: Delmeta G.

customer_reviews.title: One of the only systems that has worked for my acne
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had acne for all of my preteen/teen/adult life, this is the only product/system out of 100s that I’ve tried that actually works (for me). Keep in mind we’re all different and different things will work for different people. This has worked for me. Once you start using it, your skin will feel a little irritated or dry, but just keep using the system to let your skin get accustomed to the products. Once you’re about a week in, your skin should start to clear up and feel great. I love this system, it is fantastic for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Cassy Foster

customer_reviews.title: My skin has improved tremendously
customer_reviews.text: I am in my late 30s and still get acne. With all this mask wearing I’ve been getting a lot of acne around my chin. I usually used the acne free severe bottles but they were unavailable and I tried these. I remove my makeup and use this at night. My skin looks incredible every morning. I just rinse with cold water in the morning and apply a moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Jen R

customer_reviews.title: Worked great at first, took a break, then it didn't work at all...
customer_reviews.text: This worked amazing for the first month I've been consistently using it. My face changed and became super smooth! I stopped using this product afterwards and switched to a natural Korean based skincare for 2-3 months, then I broke out again because of lots of stress. So, I decided to use this product again and it gave me LOTS of burns and itchiness! I don't know what happened to the product, but this never happened even during my first time using it when I bought it. It was mainly the lotion causing the problem (since it contains benzoyl peroxide), and even in very small doses I couldn't get used to it after 3 weeks of usage. Wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLE!! It burns so bad! The first time I used it I thought maybe it was my skin just being weird but I just used it for the second time and omg my skin is on FIRE! I originally used the acnefree regular 3 step one and I decided to try this since the other one wasn’t in stock, well horrible idea. I’m 100% going back to the original formula and not the sensitive skin formula! I never right bad reviews but if I can save someone on the burning skin it’s totally worth the bad review. Please don’t buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Reed

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: The toner and benzoyl peroxide for 2 weeks I used it burned and this kit didn't help clear my skin. My 15 year old son Miguel I gave to him his whole face looked liked mine like was burn like red going to throw away and buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Burns & Drys Out Skin
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 17 year old. She has used Proactive in the past with no problems. I was looking for a cheaper version when I came upon this product that had pretty good reviews. The product stings her face and is drying out her skin. Needless to say it isn’t working out and the rest will have to be thrown away. Interesting too since I got the one for sensitive skin. It seems like most people had good luck with this product, but unfortunately not us.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Matheny

customer_reviews.title: Is not drying/irritating  my skin
customer_reviews.text: Not exaggerating but for me this product worked in the first try and in less the 24 hours. I have sensitive skin and was scared to buy it thinking it’ll would damage my skin plus just waste my money. I applied last night when my acne was so bad even hurting, and this morning I cant tell the pimples are drying, is not hurting anymore and my skin not irritated not dry (yet) hopefully it’ll keep working like now..... I will try it on my son’s face.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel M.

customer_reviews.title: Not for all sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I got the sensitive skin set and it didn't work for me. My acne flared up more after use, the products felt like they sat at the surface of my skin without drying or sinking in, and the lotion with Salicylic Acid burned me, when others I've tried in the past have not. It had a lovely smell and packaging, and I trust that it works for some people, but just know that if you have hyper-sensitive skin, there is a chance that it will still irritate your body and fail to clear your acne.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Check your use by dates
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 boxes and they came 1 year expired. As this is used on your face this is not ok. Very dissatisfied with this.
customer_reviews.author: Annene K.

customer_reviews.title: Helped me much more than any other acne treatments
customer_reviews.text: Helped me a lot ! More than any other acne treatment creams and cleansers that you can by in the store! But if you have hormonal acne as I did it won’t stop it, but it will help to make it not as severe. I used it with DIM pills and after a few weeks my face is almost clear!
customer_reviews.author: Valentina

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So far its been 5 days, I am using, it has helped with the acne. I should have used it earlier, i stead of spending thousands on other high end brands!
customer_reviews.author: MF1979

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Made my face peel a lot at first but that didn't last long. I really like this stuff--it started making a difference right away. You can tell when I forget an application or two.
customer_reviews.author: November Nyctophile

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stuff!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is insanely good. I have hormonal Acne and have literally tried everything. I even went to a very expensive dermatologist who gave me a very expensive product that did not work as well as this $15 set. The redness was reduced within minutes and the Acnelooked better within 24 hours
customer_reviews.author: Julia vernier

customer_reviews.title: I use it everyday and it works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, been using it for years. I’m prone to drying out my skin with a lot of other acne treatments but this one works just right. Although I sometimes have to wipe near my eyes because it does it dry a bit to much but other then that it works great. It has totally cleared up my skin. I would recommend for those with bad acne. Also I have very oily skin, so this probably works best for people with that skin type.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Oh so soft
customer_reviews.text: Oh boy, this stuff is incredible. I have sensitive skin and this stuff literally works like a charm. My face always feels so soft and refreshing after washing/toning/moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Braun

customer_reviews.title: Best skincare for acne prone sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for about 10-12 years and it is still the best. Every once in awhile, I take breaks from it to try different products that come my way. Some are more much expensive and products that people swear by. I have yet to find a product that works as well for me. This product is budget friendly and my skin looks good! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan C. Corbett

customer_reviews.title: Love this product. I’ve been using it for 3 years.
customer_reviews.text: AcneFree works great for me, it really treats acne and I have a sensitive skin so I really recommend this product for people who have acne, if you ain’t sure whether you have a sensitive skin or not, I recommend to get AcneFree for Sensitive skin so it won’t irritate your skin because it has a gentle formula. The cleanser and toner contains salicylic acid of 1.5% and the lotion spot treatment has Benzoyl Peroxide 3%. It clears up my dark spots in just 1 or 2 months, and my acne is gone just for few weeks. 💕
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: Product malfunction
customer_reviews.text: I love the product but recently when I go to use the product step #1 and squeeze the contents the top Burst open and now the cream is coming out of the top slit where the plastic comes together. Wasting all my product each time I go to use it :( not sure if they are doing something different on the pressed area? Not to mention this isn’t the only acne free product I have purchased this happened to... I also bought Therapeutic sulfur mask SAME THING 🤯
customer_reviews.author: Christina Pineda

customer_reviews.title: Caused a bad allergic reaction and gave me more acne.
customer_reviews.text: The toner caused a bad allergic reaction. It's supposed to be for sensitive skin but oh goodness it is not. If you have soap or skin allergies at all, do not get.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin V. Hanks

customer_reviews.title: Helped my postpartum skin
customer_reviews.text: My skin broke out so bad after I gave birth to my daughter. I tried several products before ancefree with no relief. This product helped my skin almost instantly and I love that it’s made for sensitive skin. I still have generalized blemishes but overall this helps keep my hormonal acne and large breakouts at bay. I use the face wash and toner 1-2 times a day and the lotion only occasionally (I have others I prefer).
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Mack

customer_reviews.title: Not good for my skin
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and unfortunately this product broke me out bad
customer_reviews.author: LaWolf Reed

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these products for my son who at 32 still suffers from bad acne. After using daily as instructed there was no sign of improvement in the slightest.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonGrandma

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this product. Hes dealt with acne here and there throughout his teenage yrs. This product start to work in just a couple uses.
customer_reviews.author: Mystery

customer_reviews.title: Great for teen boys
customer_reviews.text: My kids really enjoy these products and their teen skin has truly improved with use! Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: nichole lawson

customer_reviews.title: Shipped 9 month expired!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product was shipped with an expiration date of 06/2018. That expired 9 months ago!! The cleanser was watery and did not lather like other facial cleansers. Didn’t bother using it for fear of reaction due to it being expired. Will never buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Works for cystic acne
customer_reviews.text: The only product that works for me. I have had cystic acne and been using this for 3 months now. The wash and toner is good for sensitive skin, but I cannot use the benzoyl peroxide. It will give me a rash. I use acne free’s benzoyl peroxide “terminator “ instead in the orange bottle and I have no acne now.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Cleared my skin in 3 days. It leaves your face feeling dry though. That’s the only down side. But i put some facial cream on and it helps with that. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine J.

customer_reviews.title: Love this product really cleared up my face no acen ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this product really cleared up my face no acen anymore still use product love love recommend this to anyone with sensitive skin
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with the small tube
customer_reviews.text: If used on a regular basis, this stuff will clear your skin. However be careful with the hydrating acne repair lotion (the smallest tube) it is fairly strong and I wouldn’t use it every day, it made my lip breakout because I used too much. Still a wonderful product though!
customer_reviews.author: Kaden

customer_reviews.title: Great TREATMENT product
customer_reviews.text: The first two steps didn’t really show much of a difference it’s the third treatment step that sets it all off for my face I love it
customer_reviews.author: Deonna C.

customer_reviews.title: Instead I have big painful red blotches about an hour after using the system
customer_reviews.text: I have used the regular acne free 3 step system is before. I got the sensitive one this time in the hops it wouldn’t dry out my skin. Instead I have big painful red blotches about an hour after using the system. It looks like I spent hours in the sun without sunscreen. I wouldn’t wish this pain on anyone. Do not buy this product. I’m officially never buying Acne Free again, highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: c.dittman

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: This product gave me a really bad reaction on my face. Definitely, I don’t recommend it
customer_reviews.author: marelis rubio

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: I like this stuff. It is good. This is for the younger person.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: This item makes no sense. It did not work for me at all. It's demotivated me because after using it for more than a week I had more bumps popping up
customer_reviews.author: Sachin Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great for teen acne
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my teen daughter. Cleared her acne in 2 days. Her skin looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Cathleen

customer_reviews.title: Didnt Work.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately for me, this product was NOT sensitive enough for my skin. My eyes were super irritated with me rinsing the product off everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Erykah

customer_reviews.title: New formula
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for years and it worked wonders for my acne. Unfortunately it has changed its formula and I've had to switch to something else as the new formula did nothing for my acne.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Expired item
customer_reviews.text: I bought two items, the expiration date was 06/18. My daughter had a alergic reaction on her skin.
customer_reviews.author: YB

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: My son has only used this twice so far and I notice a difference big time. Only used twice in a week. I definitely recommend it!

customer_reviews.title: Old, past expiration
customer_reviews.text: This product was so old the packaging stated 2014 and smelled rotten. Gave my daughter a huge rash, dont reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Kennington

customer_reviews.title: wait a sec
customer_reviews.text: useless. old one was better. if its not broken, don't fix it !!
customer_reviews.author: SAM

customer_reviews.title: BURNED MY DAUGHTERS SKIN!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 17 year old daughter and it DID NOT WORK! It actually burned my daughters skin within the 3rd day. Had to stop treatment and threw it away!
customer_reviews.author: Lisette

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: The top seam of my face wash bottle split apart so when I squeeze it face wash comes out of the top and gets wasted.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Clears up acne after just a few uses
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Hanlon

customer_reviews.title: Burns and stings
customer_reviews.text: Hoped for more but no, it didn't work at all and it just kinda burned and sting you. The smell isn't the best either...
customer_reviews.author: Mandy lin

customer_reviews.title: My experience
customer_reviews.text: This has done wonders for my skin, I love it!!!

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: My skin feel like burning . Not recommended to buy.

customer_reviews.title: Do not apply around or on your eyes!!
customer_reviews.text: This has always worked for my breakouts and maintaining nice clean skin.

customer_reviews.title: Expiration Date
customer_reviews.text: Delivered to my house on February 16, 2019 with an expiration date on package of 03/19.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money, even at price point
customer_reviews.text: I have dry-ish 30 something skin. I ordered this to tame The few breakouts I get. It may be an okay product but I did not like it at all for me. The lotion made my skin feel sticky. The products in tubes were stuck and had to use a needle to get it out. Finally tossed it all in the trash. I will stick to my preferred Equate brand of proactive 3 step treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa H

customer_reviews.title: acne
customer_reviews.text: the product isn't what it seems it is really runny and I haven't seen a difference in my skin yet been using it for couple weeks and nothing
customer_reviews.author: jessica m.

customer_reviews.title: I think for someone with normal sensitive skin would love this.
customer_reviews.text: So far it has somewhat helped. I have extremely sensitive skin so I cannot use the acne lotion and and treatment everyday as it dries out my skin. But the wash always leaves my face clean and fresh. I think for someone with normal sensitive skin would love this.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Worked really well at first. I had clear skin ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well at first. I had clear skin for the first time in a long time, but over time, stopped working as well...looking for another miracle elsewhere:/
customer_reviews.author: nickie

customer_reviews.title: Works ok
customer_reviews.text: Works halfway decently for getting rid of my acne, but it doesn't irritate my skin like most treatments do. I'll take a few remaining spots in light of that.
customer_reviews.author: BP0605

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: As far as I go, it's just an OK product. Nothing has changed much except my skin turns to be more dry.
customer_reviews.author: Tung LE

customer_reviews.title: If you have sensitive skin, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: Left chemical burned and itchy after one usage. If you have sensitive skin, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: benji

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Definitely gentler than the original one but still wors great!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: I found that this product actually made my skin worse. Even though this was labeled for sensitive skin, I found that I was breaking out even more, and my skin was incredibly red! I recently switched to a different product and have seen an improvement. Overall, this is a good product, but definitely not for all sensitive skin types.
customer_reviews.author: Désirée P.

customer_reviews.title: Yay! No swelling!
customer_reviews.text: I used Proactiv for 1.5 days and in addition to redness, my face started to swell up! (Most likely because of the Benzoyl Peroxide.) These three items do not contain Benzoyl Peroxide, and I've had no issues with redness or swelling.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Goldman

customer_reviews.title: Easy on Skin
customer_reviews.text: Nice on sensitive skin. Does not leave skin dry plus it comes with a spot remover and cost half the price of proactive.
customer_reviews.author: dream17

customer_reviews.title: This system works just as good as the expensive brand
customer_reviews.text: This system works just as good as the expensive brand. I stopped using the other name brand because their deceiving reorder practices. Ok, back to this product. It works great. I prefer this sensitive kind because it doesn't dry out the skin like the regular one.
customer_reviews.author: long time shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great for people with sensitive skin. I do not, but I find that every other product dries my skin out so bad that I flake. Who wants that?? This kit does not dry your skin out and you feel so clean after using it! Will buy more
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Bye bye acne!
customer_reviews.text: I was a max clarity user until they stopped producing it. After dealing with bad break outs I got desperate. I found this through my research online and found this amazing product! I'm in my late 20s and I've dealt with acne since I was a teen. This has made my Acne history and my acne scars lighter. I love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Reina P.

customer_reviews.title: Its a good product because it works better then most acne treatments ...
customer_reviews.text: Its a good product because it works better then most acne treatments out there ..and for the price it definitely beats proactive

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand and that it comes in a sensitive ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand and that it comes in a sensitive version. However, not happy that they sent me products that expire within a few months.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for us.
customer_reviews.text: My teenager have used this daily for almost a month and has not noticed any improvement. Easy three step routine. Didn't work for us.
customer_reviews.author: A.Ray

customer_reviews.title: AcneFree Sensitive Skin Acne System
customer_reviews.text: My son uses the item and see immediate results. It instantly worked on the small pimples that he had under his chin.
customer_reviews.author: Deon Segree

customer_reviews.title: I thought that this was a great buy! When my son was almost a year ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought that this was a great buy! When my son was almost a year old and my skin was still a mess post-pregnancy, I was desperate. Initially, I used the soap 2x a day and the toner, lotion 1x a day. Within a few weeks, my skin was clear again. I still have some of the lotion and toner left after 5 months and am using that 1x a day before bed. When I am out, I will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I am a long time acne sufferer who still gets pimples as an adult. Of course, it's not the same amount or type as when I was a teenager, but pimples are never welcome. I decided to try this after the reviews on Amazon and I'm happy I did. The stuff is gentle and zaps zits in no time. It is a little drying, but as someone with combination skin, that's not an issue for me. I'd definitely recommend trying this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty skeptical about this stuff. I'm in my 50's & still get face acne. This worked very well, but you have to be diligent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Like the way it works. I have sensitive skin and this has helped greatly. I only have to use it once a day for it to keep my acne under control
customer_reviews.author: m. larabee

customer_reviews.title: Works better than anything I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Works better than anything I've ever used. I used to get cystic pimples and had perioral dermatitis. The first month it's painful, itchy, it burns and peels your skin off, but stick with it, it's worth it! Pimple free for 2 years now. I'll never use anything else again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing! I have very sensitive skin and any other ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! I have very sensitive skin and any other product that's not hypergenic usually will make my skin have a reaction or flare-ups. I have been using this product a month now and my skin is glowing I haven't broke out and that's a blessing. Definitely get this product
customer_reviews.author: sevenstarred

customer_reviews.title: Good everyday face wash
customer_reviews.text: Good for sensitive skin. I didn't have any problems. The face wash works really good.
customer_reviews.author: another pretty face

customer_reviews.title: No difference
customer_reviews.text: I have tried alot of products and have a mild skin problem that comes and goes. Just looking for something to keep consistently clear. The products feel good on the skin however I didnt notice any real improvement in my skin's quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: Great product for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: I saw a video of a girl that had rosacea and said that this product help and even though my rosacea is not as bad as hers I found this product is so nice to my skin, very gentle and no overdrying! I am in love with it! I've been using it for like a month and I could see the results right away (believe me that I am not one of those people who says this kind of line very often, but the result significantly good!) I encourage you to give it a try to this product, especially if you have sensitive skin :)
customer_reviews.author: Romelia Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The product made me breakout worse than ever before. I used proactiv before and now went back to proactiv
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yay, Acne product that doesn't turn skin into barren wasteland!
customer_reviews.text: I have used their regular acne system but felt it was too harsh on my skin. This one works better actually. I have read that the percentage of Benzoyl Peroxide doesn't make a difference anyways, so why make your skin suffer? This product also has Salilic Acid (Not sure on spelling :P) which is better than the Peroxide on non-inflammatory acne. This is a great product for a reasonable cost. Just use it in the morning and at night and in about a week you will see a big difference :)
customer_reviews.author: LolaB

customer_reviews.title: It works, what else do you want?
customer_reviews.text: This is the only system that has cleared my acne. Clean 'n Clear, Neutrogena, I thought I was going to have to go to Proactiv. But no, I found this and it works! My husband uses it too. Note - they are serious when they say avoid the eye area. I thought I was keeping the products far enough away, but I guess they got too close to my under-eye area and it turned red and flaky. Especially with the cleanser and moisturizer, focus mostly on the acne-prone areas of your face and you will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me
customer_reviews.text: I use it once a day, at night. about 30 min or more before I go to sleep for the night. I use the 3rd step spot treatment only on spots that really need it. It burns when I put it on but does the job & doesn't leave any spot or redness/dry spot. I have seen immediate results and have been using it about a week now. I will def. keep using! (sidenote: I have very mild acne, only a few trouble spots and blackheads)
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product that works as advertised. However I always run out of the cleanser too soon.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip C. Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: After one week of use, I noticed my face started to clear up and little to no break outs. I have sensitive skin, this product did not irritate my skin at all, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sunni_Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Working for 50%
customer_reviews.text: This one is working! It doesn't help completely, but it reduced all my skin problems for 50%. However it dries even my oily skin, so I recommend to mix the creme with any other hydrating.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best I've used!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!! Best acne system I've ever used! This system, combined with an at home Salicylic Acid peel once every 10-14 days virtually eliminated my extremely severe acne. Best of all it doesn't dry out your skin like most other acne products. Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Buffspartan

customer_reviews.title: Clearer,smoother skin!
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using for 3weeks n my skin is clearer and more refined. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Acne Treatment and Prevention System
customer_reviews.text: Great acne treatment and prevention for the face. Worked better for me than Proactive and was even cheaper! I have sensitive skin and this caused a little drying but did not cause any sort of peeling. After a few applications my skin got used to it and I did not have any issues, great for outbreaks when you have sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Tkach

customer_reviews.title: Really Good
customer_reviews.text: Personally I love this stuff. It has really helped me get rid of pimples and keep them away! One of the better products I've used to get rid of acne and now I rarely get more than a couple on my face at a time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great success story!
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely impresses with this skin care combo and at such a great price. My skin went through some hormonal changes lately and I was dealing with acne in my 50's as though I were a teenager. Acne Free for sensitive skin was just what my skin needed! I am a very satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Caid

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: My 15 year old uses this twice a day. It works wonderfully. The thing is, you have to be consistent. Twice a day everyday! Preferable around the same times of day too. We really love it. You can't be lazy about it though
customer_reviews.author: sweetgoldilocs

customer_reviews.title: Keep Coming Back
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product off an on for the past two years. I switch to more natural products, but they never work as well as this. I don'w even wash my face with this every day and it keeps my skin clear. The only issue I have with this product is the Spot Treatment / Daily Moisturizer, it makes my skin shiny, especially during the summer months, I have combination skin, with an oily T-Zone area, and this lotion makes it even more obvious with the heat hits. Might want to add a mattifying lotion if you have the same skin type.
customer_reviews.author: Bri Bolton

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I've had annoying acne since puberty and this set changed my skin dramatically. 4 starts because it's a little drying and I haven't discovered a moisturizer that'd work with this set without the pimples going back.
customer_reviews.author: Chris & Rachel Catabona

customer_reviews.title: Great for moderate-to-severe acne prone skin w/o overdrying!
customer_reviews.text: Tried EVERYTHING in the past without any success, and with a lot of pain, embarrassment, and only a blemish filled face to show for my efforts. This is the only thing that works! I have combination dry/oily skin, and this doesn't over-dry my face like other products did. The only time I break-out now is if I'm lazy and don't wash my face, or if I touch my face a lot. Now that I've found my eureka acne product, I will never try out anything else.
customer_reviews.author: For the love of books!!

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Happy with it. Bought it for my daughter. So far, seems to be doing the job, that's if she uses like she supposed to, lol. If she skips a day or two, it shows.delivered fast.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnna Oyler

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in my local pharmacy but when I needed a refill I turned to Amazon and it was cheaper and I got it the next day. Really amazing.
customer_reviews.author: IRISROSE

customer_reviews.title: Not good at all !
customer_reviews.text: Is it only me or everyone will get hurt for the first time using this AcneFree ? especially the HYDRATING ACNE REPAIR LOTION + SPOT TREATMENT, it becomes red and dry and hurt whenever i use it on my acne's land. I'm so confused that if i allergies this item or not ...
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hoang

customer_reviews.title: I still don't get how such an amazing and effective product can be this cheap
customer_reviews.text: I still don't get how such an amazing and effective product can be this cheap. I tried because of its price, best choice ever. I FINALLY got to have a clean face without any zits after only one week of use.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Vorsatz

customer_reviews.title: this works WAAAY better than ProActive
customer_reviews.text: It works and it doesn't irritate or dry up my skin at all, personally. The bottles are a bit small, though. So you have to keep rebuying a new package after a month or so if you use this medication consistently. Anyways, for me, this works WAAAY better than ProActive, and you'll also be doing your wallet a favor.
customer_reviews.author: Pia

product_meta.title: Acne Free 3 Step Acne Treatment Kit - Salicylic Acid Acne Face Wash and Alcohol-Free Toner with Benzoyl Peroxide Lotion - Anti Acne Solution for Teenagers and Adults - For Sensitive Skin
product_meta.description:
60 DAY SUPPLY OF ACNEFREE THE #1 ACNE KIT SOLD IN STORES – Each AcneFree Kit provides you with products that will help treat your acne while taking care of your skin for 2 months! Compare and save money as opposed to competing brands

 

3 SIMPLE STEPS FOR A COMPLETE SKINCARE ROUTINE:
1. Cleanse your face with the 1.5% Salicylic Acid Acne Face Wash to gently cleanse clogged pores and remove acne bacteria
2. Tone with the Alcohol-Free Toner infused with fruit enzymes to balance skin 
3. Moisturize with the Sensitive Skin Acne Moisturizer containing 3% micronized Benzoyl Peroxide to continue treating acne throughout the day. Also contains ginger and tea tree extracts to sooth acne inflammed skin

Use AM and PM to treat all stages of acne, 24 hours/day.
feature_bullets: SPECIALLY DEVELOPED FOR sensitive skin, formulated with dermatologist-endorsed 1.5% Saicylic Acid cleanser to elimiate breakouts without over-drying or stripping the skin of natural nutrients
STARTS CLEARING BREAKOUTS in 1-3 days. This fast-clearing system is the dermatologist approach to clear acne
REVITALIZING AND BALANCING alcohol-free toner contains fruit enzymes to remove excess dirt and dead skin cells
GENTLE MOISTURIZER for sensitive acne-prone skin with 3% micronized Benzoyl Peroxide to continuously treat acne throughout the day
TREAT + CARE with gentle Salicylic Acid and low concentrations of Benzoyl Peroxide, along with Fruit Enzymes, Ginger, and Tea Tree extracts to soothe, calm, and hydrate skin
